name: basic_scene
input:
<q:application id="basic-game" type="game" engine="2d">
  <qg:scene name="main" width="800" height="600" background="#87CEEB">
    <qg:physics gravity-y="9.8" bounds="canvas" />
    <qg:sprite id="player" src="player.png" x="100" y="300" body="dynamic" controls="wasd" speed="5" />
    <qg:sprite id="ground" src="ground.png" x="400" y="580" width="800" height="40" body="static" tag="solid" />
  </qg:scene>
</q:application>
